My dad knew me as being a crybaby and being really fragile.
He thought I would get beat up and quit,...
A lot of people on my mom's side of the family was like, what is she doing?
Nobody really understood it but me.
Yes, there has been times in boxing when I was like,...
..."Oh, I hate this, I don't wanna do this anymore",...
...but I always find my way back to the gym...
Whoever wants it more, then that's where you'd wanna put in the most work.
And the faster are those that don't always win the race,...
